attributes.additional_details: Because it’s killing local family businesses and transport companies emergency services employees general public

rejection.details:
We understand you want fuel prices to be reduced, however it's not clear what action you want the Government to take in order to achieve this. 

In any case, the price charged for fuel is a matter for retailers, not the UK Government.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908
